plot: Lucas, who escapes the modern world via cinematic fantasies, meets a young woman who forces him to question his self-appointed role as the last romantic man on earth.
title: The Last Romantic
plot_es: Lucas, who escapes the modern world via cinematic fantasies, meets a young woman who forces him to question his self-appointed role as the last romantic man on earth.
plot_en: Lucas, who escapes the modern world via cinematic fantasies, meets a young woman who forces him to question his self-appointed role as the last romantic man on earth.
